products.description: 11th Generation Intel® Core™ i3-1115G4 Processor (3.00 GHz up to 4.10 GHz), 8 GB (4 GB Soldered DDR4 2666MHz + 4 GB SO-DIMM DDR4 2666MHz), 512 GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe Gen3/4
Powered by the Intel Celeron N3350 Processor (2M Cache, up to 2.4GHz) for fast and snappy performance, 4 GB DDR3 RAM; 32GB eMMC hard drive; No CD or DVD drive
11th Generation Intel Core i3 Processor for fast performance,8GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM for smooth using experience, 512GB SSD to store all your files
It is a small brand but it will be big brand near future
